name: Awoken Nightmare
description:
Welcome to the world of nightmares!

In this spooky platformer you play as Celestia, a little mage. She experimented with a type of dream magic, which catapulted her into a creepy nightmare world. Now she lost all her magic. Collect the magical orbs to restore it and destroy the barriers in your way. Maybe the light in the distance can guide you?

Features

- an atmospheric spooky world

- different types of platforms and barriers

- collecibles

- color deficiency mode

Controls

WASD or Left Stick - Movement

Space or South Button - Jump

E or East Button - Interact

ESC or Start - Pause

Credits

Game

Klara Herler

Sounds

WeLoveIndies

Epidemic Sound
